extendedInfo.description: The mobile companion to the Charms Office Assistant for Parents/Student/Members! Includes the recording studio to record alone, to play along and record with accompaniments, and to complete assignments. Also includes the Charms Parent/Student/Member Mobile Portal, with the calendar, financial statement, practice logs, teacher contacts, links to handouts and files, password change and a place to update personal information.NOTE: If you have any technical problems with the APP, please don't post them here, contact our office at 214-556-1912 and we will try to help you. Your problem might be unique to YOUR situation and we can probably help you. Or you can email our support team at charmssupport@charmsmusic.comFAQ: HEADPHONES:  The Android version of the app is not intended to be used with headphones if you want to merge your recording with the accompaniment track.SLEEPING: iOS puts the app in the background when sleeping. The user can set their device sleep/timeout to whatever they want to avoid sleeping while recording.MULTIPLE RECORDINGS: If you are recording several recordings in a row, you need to touch the "trash" icon to clear out any existing tracks or recordings in the memory of the app before starting a new one.MULTIPLE STUDENTS: If you are using one device to record multiple students, be sure to completely sign the other student out by "killing" the app in the task bar of your device before logging in the other student. The APP will keep the student in memory until you do this. Also be sure to click the "trash" button before starting a new student recording.LENGTH OF RECORDING: There is a 20MB limit on files that can be uploaded to the cloud, but that's a very large file. Depending on the memory of your device and the speed of your network connection, your results may vary.NUMBER OF RECORDINGS: There is no limit to the number of recordings a student may upload. But each recording name must be unique.

reviews.title: I try to login
reviews.comment: Trying to press the blue done button...does nothing on my s4
reviews.author: bob millford

reviews.title: Wwwwwooooooowww
reviews.comment: Cool
reviews.author: Felisita Moreno

reviews.title: A must-have for all Charms band members
reviews.comment: An excellent app! Great for checking up on the football game schedule and such when I\'m on the go.
reviews.author: Owen Shapley

reviews.title: What? No teacher version for Android?
reviews.comment: Teacher version on android please....
reviews.author: Patrick Holen

reviews.title: Boooooooo
reviews.comment: Horrible I press blue botton and dose nothing I did it like ten times what a waste of space
reviews.author: felicity silbernagel

reviews.title: Very Helpful
reviews.comment: Very convenient and accurate app! No problems with logging in. I love being able to view the calendar & financials on the go!
reviews.author: Kiah Coleman

reviews.title: Immediately signed me in as another user!
reviews.comment: I\'m hoping I can get some help, because it won\'t let me sign in. As soon as I downloaded the app, I was signed in as another student from another state, and I can see all their personal info!  But I love the program! If I can get some help, that would be wonderful. I\'m not sure how it happened, but I hope that someone else won\'t take advantage of other\'s info, if they are put in a similar situation.
reviews.author: Hannah Carmody

reviews.title: Needs a little work
reviews.comment: Can\'t play mp3 or open pdf files loaded into Charms. My phone has pdf reader and music player already installed. I can play mp3 & open pdf files outside of charms just fine.
reviews.author: Debbie Richmond

reviews.title: Still not working.
reviews.comment: Is still says Charleston train school or Virginia tech. When I log into my school, it still isn\'t coming up. Also, when I hit \"Done\" after typing in my log in information, it won\'t let me access. I have to exit the app and enter back in just to have my account not come up.
reviews.author: Joe Borgia

reviews.title: It\'s Alright
reviews.comment: My Director has uploaded mp3\'s and PDF files and I can\'t seem to access them on the app, but I went to the website and it opened is there anything you can do
reviews.author: Kystyn Lundy

reviews.title: Sync Calendar
reviews.comment: Does anyone know how you can sync the calendar with your phone? I have the Samsung Galaxy S4.
reviews.author: Kyndra Bailey

reviews.title: Works great...
reviews.comment: Fix the name though.  How about an app for admin access please.
reviews.author: Mathew Trout

reviews.title: Won\'t let me sign in
reviews.comment: Downloaded app which in my opinion downloaded faster than any other app. The done button isn\'t working. I uninstalled and just went through browser. Slower but Works!!
reviews.author: Misty Kennedy

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: No more problems with Java anymore! But why does it say Charleston Train School instead of my school in the main page?
reviews.author: Phil Son

reviews.title: Incorrect info
reviews.comment: Done button doesn\'t seem to work, and I get a profile of a Virginia tech student..
reviews.author: Jorge Milian

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: VERY useful for parents accessing student/member-side account information like financial balances, and much more!
reviews.author: Paul Brown

reviews.title: Just bad.
reviews.comment: The app just works like a mobile website. Clunky and without features. I can\'t even click on calendar events, much less sync it. It works... just sucks.  Galaxy S3
reviews.author: Brandan Hoffman

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This app is a great idea, I play trumpet with my middle school and this app comes very handy at times.
reviews.author: Andy Dafoe

reviews.title: Yay
reviews.comment: I can finally use charms on my tablet!
reviews.author: Dakota Allen

reviews.title: Ggggg
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: John Jacob Arrojado
